description: Rice Communications' staff took turns to work and play in Bali over two months. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Future of work: PR firm rents six-bedroom Bali villa for staff, champions overseas remote work
title_page: Future of work: PR firm rents six-bedroom Bali villa for staff, champions overseas remote work | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ Instead of gathering all its staff for a big office retreat, Rice Communications held what it calls a rolling retreat in Bali.
The strategic communications and public relations consultancy rented a six-bedroom villa in the trendy Canggu district from Sept 20 to Nov 15 in 2022.
